column5: Has anyone stayed at New Moon Lodge on LOTW? If, yes, how was it? Looks like a nice family run resort. Feedback welcome.Thanks

The "Moen" family has had the resort for a couple of generations. By my scale, I believe they are a 4 to 5 star operation, plus located in some premier fishing waters. The camp has been very well maintained over the years, & their "American Plan" package is exceptional. If you do have your own boat, they have in the past charged a docking fee per day. I'm not a big fan of that charge! Otherwise, it is a resort on an Island that deserves your consideration. Set the hook, CRJohn
Thank You for the feedback. Has anyone else stayed at the New Moon?
